ing: 50 fluid ounces white cranberry juice, partially frozen
des: "A tangy lime, lemon, and ginger ale punch with a twist of white cranberry juice. Serve virgin or alcoholic - your choice. Add tequila for a more grown up version."
ins: Mix ginger ale and margarita mix in a large bowl. Add cranberry juice and large chunks of ice to keep mixture cool. Float orange and lemon slices on top.
